name: climfvd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cli, c1)), wbr(c1, cli, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cli, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cli, c0))
-| wi(wbr(c1, cli, c0), wceq(c0, cfv(cli, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cli, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cli, c0))
-| wi(wbr(c1, cli, c0), wceq(c0, cfv(cli, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wbr(c1, cli, c0), wceq(c0, cfv(cli, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cli, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cli, c0))

comment: The limit of a convergent sequence, expressed as the function value of the convergence relation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
